actions.text: Referred jointly to Senate Committees on Appropriations; Budget; Finance; Labor and Human Resources To be reported by the Committee on Appropriations pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Labor Department.

official_title: A resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for the welfare reform demonstration programs administered by the Employment and Training Administration of the Department of Labor.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval by the Senate of the proposed deferral of budget authority for the welfare reform programs administered by the Employment and Training Administration of the Department of Labor as set forth in a special message transmitted by the President to the Congress under the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 (deferral D-81-36A).

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for the welfare reform demonstration programs administered by the Employment and Training Administration of the Department of Labor.
